name: 劉宛育
objective: The course attempts to give an introduction to methods of architectural design from aspects of both substantive knowledge and process skills. A large number of projects will be referred as examples.
schedule:
Week 01　09/16: Introduction
Week 02　09/23: Construction & Materiality I
Week 03　09/30: Construction & Materiality II
Week 04　10/07: Diagrams I
Week 05　10/14: Diagrams II
Week 06　10/21: Review I
Week 07　10/28: Learning skills
Week 08　11/04: Exterior design I
Week 09　11/11: 期中考週
Week 10　11/18: Exterior design II
Week 11　11/25: Exterior design III
Week 12　12/02: Exterior design IV
Week 13　12/09: Review II
Week 14　12/16: Parameters I
Week 15　12/23: Parameters II
Week 16　12/30: Review III
Week 17　01/06: 期末評圖
Week 18　01/13: 期末考週
materials:
Koolhaas, Rem & Mau, Bruce (1995) S,M,L,XL. The Monacelli Press.
Koolhaas, Rem (1997) Delirious New York: A Retroactive Manifesto for Manhattan. The Monacelli Press.
Cros, Susanna (2003) The Metapolis Dictionary of Advanced Architecture: City, Technology and Society in the Information Age. ACTAR.
Blanciak, Francois (2008) Siteless: 1001 Building Forms. The MIT Press.
Ingels, Bjarke (2009) Yes Is More: An Archicomic on Architectural Evolution. Evergreen.

Mari & Yoo (2012) Operative Design: A Catalog of Spatial Verbs. BIS Publishers.
Muckenheim & Demel (2012) Inspiration: Contemporary Design Methods in Architecture. BIS Publishers.
